DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: You don't sound so great. Are you all right?
RESPONSE TEXT: On a stretcher, I'm told. I grew ill during our exile. When I woke, I was in this place.
SCRIPT NOTES: A little smirk on "On a stretcher." / InPain

RESPONSE TEXT: They said a woman wreathed in black led us here. But that it was already occupied. By an old robot lost in its own dreams.
Slept away its days in the upper chambers. Had little interest in Atom, but interested in us.
But it left many years ago. Decided it would be best if we had a place... of our own.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Not feeling great at the moment.

RESPONSE TEXT: Good. Good. Was there... something more?
Good. Was there more you needed attended to?
May it stay that way. Now, what else?
Allow me to... hmm. Not too bad. You won't be joining Atom just yet.
Mhmm. A simple remedy. This may burn a bit.
Nothing too bad. Still, risky... to leave untreated.
Oh, child. This... may hurt. A lot.

RESPONSE TEXT: Atom above. This will require... extra antiseptic.

RESPONSE TEXT: Atom's will, you're lucky to be breathing. This requires immediate attention.
I'm sorry, child. My supplies... they have costs. Is there something else I can do?
We all must contribute to the church. You... cannot. Now, something else?
This procedure, there are costs. You understand, don't you, child? You require... something else?
Caps are a... necessary evil, in this case. Our stocks cost much to refill. But was there something else?
Take care of yourself, my child.
